com.midlocanics.frc.gongaware

Class RobotComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.midlocanics.frc.gongaware.RobotComponent
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BalanceSystem, BallCollection, BridgeAccess, DriveTrain, Dumper, Shooter

    public abstract class RobotComponent
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class representing any component on a robot. This is used for a tick based system where check() is called and when it returns true, call the run()
    Author:
    Ross Gongaware

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Controller controller
      Variable representing the controller for this component.

      Gets the time since last run.
      abstract void reset()
      Resets the running of the component to it's initial state.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • controller

        protected Controller controller
        Variable representing the controller for this component. Needed to properly control each component.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RobotComponent

        public RobotComponent()

    • Method Detail

      • check

        public abstract boolean check()
        Checks to see if the component needs to run. If true, should be followed by a run() call.
        Returns:
        Whether component needs to be run

      • run

        public void run()
        Runs the component. Should return quickly and not hold up the running of the robot. Will be called successively.

      • reset

        public abstract void reset()
        Resets the running of the component to it's initial state. Called at the beginning of tele-op once to ensure everything is in it's initial state.

      • getTimeSinceLastRun

        public double getTimeSinceLastRun()
        Gets the time since last run. Use this only if you also call super.run().
        Returns:
        The time since the last run in seconds.
